titleInfo.title: Building the Madonna of Peace Shrine

mods.abstract: Brother Alfred Moroni and Oscar Menzer mortared bricks in the Grotto for the Madonna of Peace Shrine in February 1955 (disregard the hand-written note). Menzer, along with Louis Brenner were the designers of the structure. The Shrine was the senior project of the CBC high school class of 1955.
